name: Demeo Battles
abstract: Demeo Battles is a competitive turn-based strategy game for 1-4 players. Choose your champion, assemble an army of monstrous minions & team up with another champion in your quest for turn-based glory!

detail.app_languages: English, French, Spanish, German, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
detail.app_release_note:
- Mixed Reality: Added AR mode!
- Requirements for unlocking single player stars can now be viewed both before and after a single player game.
- Skipping turns now works properly.
- All tombstone skins should now display their HP UI properly.
- AI Heroes can no longer illegally target themselves with buffing abilities.
- Fixed bug that caused AI Warlocks to check if their own HP was half or lower rather than the target's when using Consuming Vortex.
- General improvements to single player AI.
- General UI polish.
- Fixed an oversight causing an opponent's position to be revealed if their hand was full when receiving a card.
- Fixed bug that caused the game to crash if a tombstone was attacked under certain circumstances.
- Fixed rats desyncing in a multiplayer match when spawned in via abilities.
- Units can no longer end up out of bounds in Cesspool of Despair.
- Miscellaneous fixes to monster AI.
